## Protocol.Emulation.SetVirtualTimePolicyRequest.initialVirtualTime property

If set, base::Time::Now will be overriden to initially return this value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initialVirtualTime?: Network.TimeSinceEpoch;
```
